ComicInfo.Summary: Sara and Jake investigate the mysterious murder of a federal agent who is investigating a telecommunications company. When Sara tracks down the woman she believes to be the murderer, she finds herself restrained by invisible demons. She is saved by the Magdalena who takes down her opponent and helps her free herself from her mystic bondage.
